chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true

Premises:
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
ad = BinNums.N : Set
rec_list_terms = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d
rec_term = fix rec_term (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match t with | app c l => match MapGet state d a with | Some lts => match MapGet prec_list lts c with | Some pre => rec_list_terms d pre l k | None => false end | None => false end end end with rec_list_terms (d : preDTA) (pre : prec_list) (l : term_list) (n : nat) {struct n} : bool := match n with | 0 => false | S k => match pre with | prec_cons st stp pre' => match l with | tnil => false | tcons hd tl => rec_list_terms d pre' l k || rec_term d st hd k && rec_list_terms d st
preDTA = Map state : Set
Inductive term : Set := app : ad -> term_list -> term with term_list : Set := tnil : term_list | tcons : term -> term_list -> term_list
state = Map prec_list : Set
semantic_equiv_0_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p l n = true
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_3 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s
semantic_equiv_0_6 : forall (n : nat) (t : term) (t0 : term_list), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (m : nat), rec_term d a t m = true -> reconnaissance d a t) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (m : nat), rec_list_terms d p t0 m = true -> liste_reconnait d p t0) -> forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p (tcons t t0) n = true -> liste_reconnait d p (tcons t t0)
rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl)
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
invar_list = fun tl : term_list => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), rec_list_terms d p tl n = true -> n <= m -> rec_list_terms d p tl m = true : term_list -> Prop
mstrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term) (s0 : state_reconnait p s t), P0 p s t s0
mlrec_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list) (l : liste_reconnait p p0 t), P1 p p0 t l
mreconnaissance_ind : forall (P : forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> Prop) (P0 : forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> Prop) (P1 : forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> Prop), (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state) (e : MapGet state d a = Some ladj) (s : state_reconnait d ladj t), P0 d ladj t s -> P d a t (rec_dta d a t ladj e s)) ->...-> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (r : reconnaissance p a t), P p a t r
invar_term = fun t : term => forall (n m : nat) (d : preDTA) (a : ad), rec_term d a t n = true -> n <= m -> rec_term d a t m = true : term -> Prop
semantic_equiv_0_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true -> p = prec_empty
sem_equiv_prop_l = fun l : term_list => forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat), rec_list_terms d p l n = true -> liste_reconnait d p l : term_list -> Prop
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
semantic_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t
reconnaissance_ind : forall P : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> P d a t) -> forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term), reconnaissance p a t -> P p a t
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
sem_equiv_prop_t = fun t : term => forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (n : nat), rec_term d a t n = true -> reconnaissance d a t : term -> Prop
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t
semantic_equiv_0_1 = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (n : nat) (H : rec_list_terms d p tnil n = true) => let H0 : p = prec_empty := semantic_equiv_0_0 d p n H in (fun H1 : p = prec_empty => eq_ind_r (fun p0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d p0 tnil) (rec_empty d) H1) H0 : sem_equiv_prop_l tnil
conservation_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (l : term_list), prec_in_dta d p -> S (essence_list l d p) <= essence (app c l) d
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)
ZMicromega.Vars.Facts.choose_mem_1 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = Some x -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true
borne_0 : forall (s : state) (p : prec_list), prec_in_state s p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 s
sign_spec : forall (C : Type) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (get_sign : C -> option C), sign_theory copp ceqb get_sign -> forall c c' : C, get_sign c = Some c' -> ceqb c (copp c') = true
borne_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list), prec_in_dta d p -> taille_0 p <= DTA_taille d
dta_rec_term = fun (d : DTA) (t : term) => match d with | dta p a => rec_term p a t (essence t p) end : DTA -> term -> bool
borne_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state), state_in_dta d s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille d
in_M1_id : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (x : ad) (e : A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M1 A x e) c = Some a) -> a = e
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem_1 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.mem x s = true
liste_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop, (forall d : preDTA, P d prec_empty tnil) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd -> liste_reconnait d la tl -> P d la tl -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> (forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d ls (tcons hd tl) -> P d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (p0 : prec_list) (t : term_list), liste_reconnait p p0 t -> P p p0 t
sem_listes_2 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list), liste_reconnait d pl tnil -> pl = prec_empty
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose_1 : forall (s : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = Some x -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In x s
Record sign_theory (C : Type) (copp : C -> C) (ceqb : C -> C -> bool) (get_sign : C -> option C) : Prop := mksign_th { sign_spec : forall c c' : C, get_sign c = Some c' -> ceqb c (copp c') = true } For sign_theory: Argument C is implicit For mksign_th: Argument C is implicit For sign_theory: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope] For mksign_th: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]

``` 
intros d a c t n s p H1 H2 H3.
apply (semantic_equiv_0_2 d a (app c t) n s p).
- apply H3.
- apply H1.
- apply H2.
```
